facebook.title: How to configure Meta (Facebook) tracking?
facebook.quickStartDesc: Don't know what to configure? Just follow these 4 steps:

quickStartSteps.step1: Go to Meta Events Manager ‚Üí Your Pixel ‚Üí Settings
quickStartSteps.step2: Copy Pixel ID ‚Üí paste in 'Pixel ID' field below

facebook.step3: Copy the Pixel ID and paste it above
